COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: I woke up quite early for me, and started getting ready
to go out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: On this day only each year, the people I met and the
clothes I wore were different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, won't you be late if you don't leave now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: [Chris] “I'll make it if I run a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176
STRING: [Phorni] “It's hard to stay on your shoulder, so leave
when you have enough time to walk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: I laughed, listening to Phorni's selfish request.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: Since I wouldn't be able to spend much time with her
for a while from then on, I felt I had to give her that
much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, sorry. Let me just put on my uniform.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6
STRING: I put on my uniform jacket as Ninna said, and was ready
to go out right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: When I inhaled the cool air outside, that was enough
for it to feel like Natale morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: There weren't many people about, so a sort of solemn
atmosphere was in the air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: I shivered from the cold and was worried about Phorni
for a moment, but soon remembered I didn't need to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a
STRING: [Chris] “A little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: I answered this way, and something about the
apartment's mail box caught my attention.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4
STRING: But I soon realized no letter would be there, and even if
there was, I had no time to read it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: [Chris] “We should hurry up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Torta] “Morning. Looks like you actually woke up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: [Chris] “Looks like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a
STRING: The fact that Phorni woke me up was of course a secret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: I couldn't just leave right away, so I asked after Ninna,
trying not to sound unnatural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “Is Ninna already awake?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: [Torta] “Of course she is... She's up early every day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Chris] “Oh. I'll go say hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42e
STRING: I slid by Torta as she stood at the door, and
approached Ninna's chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x444
STRING: [Chris] “Is the top of the table alright?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x476
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48c
STRING: I said this so only Phorni could hear, and she answered
in her normal voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d4
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh, it's you, Chris. Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ea
STRING: She wasn't supposed to be able to see, but she knew I
was there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x504
STRING: In that instant, Phorni flitted gracefully down to the
table and waved to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522
STRING: [Phorni] “Hup... Ah. Mm, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: [Ninna] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: [Ninna] “Because you came to say hi to me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right. Thank you for today. For the tickets. I
know you were really looking forward to going yourself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b2
STRING: [Ninna] “That's alright. You go listen to lots of good
music.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. We have to go to pray soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x632
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x648
STRING: Torta must not have been able to wait anymore, as she
came in from the entryway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x654
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x686
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma, it depends on the time, but is it okay
if we don't come back before the concert?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ae
STRING: [Ninna] “That's fine, of course. It may be difficult for you
to find a place to eat today, but I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x724
STRING: As expected, there were many people on the main
street.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x730
STRING: Most of the stores were closed, so almost all of the
people must have been on their way to church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: Today's Mass was different from those held on other
holidays, as all the church doors were opened wide so
that as many people as possible could attend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x770
STRING: The ceremony itself was quite unceremonious. Priests
didn't read from the teachings, and neither bread nor
wine was given out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x786
STRING: However, the sound of hymns always filled the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: And, perhaps this was the most troublesome thing of
all, one could line up to receive the Father's blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: Of course, as the church was wide open, it was possible
to go straight in and pray, but it was normal to wait, in
a line that stretched outside depending on the time of
day, for a blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: For the past two years, Arietta and I had lined up and
received blessings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x808
STRING: We weren't very serious in our faith, but it was sort of a
yearly tradition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81e
STRING: It would be fair to say that not going was more
uncommon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82a
STRING: Even Ninna would normally go to church, but her legs
were bad so she couldn't go with us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84a
STRING: The people of this country would probably insist that
one should go regardless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x860
STRING: But in this city, priests known as “Fathers” would visit
old people's homes and shelters, and bestow their
blessings .

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: I heard from Torta that a Father would visit Ninna's
house around noon every year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a8
STRING: [Torta] “It's nice that there aren't so many people this
early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c8
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? It's been like this every year, so I didn't
especially notice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: [Torta] “Be grateful to Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91a
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose so... So what time do you usually
come, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh, I didn't want to run into you and Arie,
so I just kind of wandered over around noon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x976
STRING: [Chris] “Ummm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, people are gonna line up if we just stand
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: Saying this, Torta moved tauntingly ahead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fe
STRING: Now that we'd come this far, we could see people
streaming toward the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa14
STRING: I hurried to catch up with Torta in the middle of the
stream, who was smiling while humming the verse of a
hymn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3a
STRING: [Chris] “What? Singing all the sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: [Torta] “Come on, can't you hear it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: When I listened, I could just barely hear voices in what
sounded like a hymn, as Torta said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: [Chris] “You can sing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Torta] “We learn them. I suppose Fortelle students
don't do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: [Chris] “We do simple vocal songs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: [Torta] “And there are lots of students from the
communal school singing at today's Mass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: [Chris] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb46
STRING: [Torta] “You know that they sing hymns in the church all
day today, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6e
STRING: [Torta] “It would be impossible for one choir so they
split into about three groups so some can rest while the
others sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba0
STRING: [Torta] “So a fair few people are needed, and our school
recruits a certain number every year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: [Chris] “I guess there's no pay for that kind of thing,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf2
STRING: [Torta] “Of course not. I heard they get food, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Chris] “You won't do it, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3a
STRING: [Torta] “Do I look like I would?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc50
STRING: [Chris] “This is just my opinion, but I said it because you
look like you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8c
STRING: [Torta] “Really...? Well, I'm pretty busy this time of year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: [Chris] “Well, that's your choice to make, I don't really
care.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd4
STRING: [Torta] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: As we walked and talked, the singing voices got louder
and louder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: The fog-shrouded church, with the whiteness of its
stones, looked beautiful and majestic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5c
STRING: I couldn't normally feel the presence of God, but when I
went to a church like this, I could feel it intensely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7c
STRING: [Chris] “Even so, there's a pretty long line.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: There were already a fair amount of people lined up in
the open space in front of the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: Despite how many people were there, the area was
strangely quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: Everyone was calm, and I could feel a mysterious
atmosphere even in the air around us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xddc
STRING: It wasn't that everyone was silent, though, and I could
sometimes hear whispered words here and there, and
voices that weren't quite a buzz.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfc
STRING: But even that was only in the breaks between the
hymns echoing from the cathedral.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: I spoke to Torta in the same whispered voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1e
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe about thirty more minutes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe50
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm, there are more people than I thought. It
may be an hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe70
STRING: [Chris] “There's usually half this many at this hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: Saying only this in reply,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xedc
STRING: Torta frowned as if to tell me not to talk so much,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf02
STRING: then smiled as if to say it couldn't be helped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf18
STRING: Then she turned her gaze to the front of the line again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf32
STRING: I gazed casually at her profile so she wouldn't notice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3e
STRING: Torta's behavior strongly reminded me of a certain
person I knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf54
STRING: Arietta always laughed reluctantly after scolding me like
this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: They were similar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf76
STRING: I couldn't help but think so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf82
STRING: They were identical twins, so of course the shape of
their faces was similar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf98
STRING: But this was something totally different...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfae
STRING: Anyone who knew the twins for a long time would
certainly have the same feeling as me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: In other words, they weren't similar.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd0
STRING: The way they spoke, the way they treated people, even
what they were good and bad at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfdc
STRING: Then I remembered what Torta said before on our way
home from shopping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: It may have been true that each would cover for what
the other lacked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1038
STRING: Time passed even as we listened to the hymns, and we
were finally about to enter the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1066
STRING: When we entered the cathedral, there were large shells
to the right and left that contained holy water.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107c
STRING: In keeping with the standard procedure, I dipped my
fingers in it and lightly touched my head, chest, and left
then right shoulders to cross myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1092
STRING: After taking just one step inside, we were surrounded
by the choir music, more overwhelming than we
could've imagined from the outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a8
STRING: Torta listened to the voices and closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b4
STRING: Right at the back, the priest placed his hand over the
heads of the people in line, murmuring something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ca
STRING: More than half of those who received blessings
remained in the church, while the remaining few moved
toward the exit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ea
STRING: To calm my mind, I averted my eyes from the scene and
closed them like Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111a
STRING: The whole idea of Mass was to offer prayers to reaffirm
our existence as “flesh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1130
STRING: Simply put, God existed only in “spirit”; humans could
not speak to God directly, nor even imagine him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1146
STRING: And, obsessed with things of the flesh, such as idols or
material wealth, many people would forget the “spirit”
within them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: The goal of Mass was for people to reaffirm their own
existence and confess their actions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117e
STRING: And the one who served as a bridge between people
and God and delivered their prayers, was the Father.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: That's why people went to pray at church, where they
could find a priest to act as a mediary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c8
STRING: When I opened my eyes, the line had moved forward
and it was almost my turn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11de
STRING: Because both us were in a single line, Torta and I would
be blessed together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f4
STRING: As the person in front of me appeared before the priest,
I bowed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: Then it was finally our turn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: [Chris] “Bless me, Father.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122c
STRING: We both said this at the same time, and took a step
forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1248
STRING: We held our hands in prayer and lowered our heads,
whereupon the Father touched our heads and
whispered something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: It was in an old language, so I didn't understand the
actual meaning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126a
STRING: But the words I caught here and there were ones that I
remembered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1280
STRING: They must have been verses from the teachings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128c
STRING: I wasn't letting the words pass over me, but they
wouldn't really stick in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a2
STRING: It was just that large palm touching my head, and the
next instant it was over as if nothing had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b8
STRING: I glanced sideways to check on Torta, and she also had
her eyes closed to quietly receive the blessing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: I gazed at her profile as if charmed by it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12da
STRING: It was shockingly like my girlfriend's profile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f0
STRING: If you added to that expressionless face the fact that
the two were twins, then you could say that what I was
thinking was natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1310
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131c
STRING: It wasn't only that, though; I couldn't help but feel it was
something special.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135e
STRING: [Torta] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1374
STRING: Torta said this softly to let me know she was finished.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138a
STRING: We moved to the side of the line, and I spoke in the
same soft voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: [Chris] “So after this...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b4
STRING: [Torta] “We'll stay a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ca
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e0
STRING: I was going to say we should stay and pray, but that
was normal, so it seemed Torta was thinking the same
thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: On either side of the line, people were offering their
prayers, their eyes closed as if in meditation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: We did the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143e
STRING: And I reflected on the person I'd become.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144a
STRING: Thinking back like this, I realized I had been nothing but
selfish.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1460
STRING: I had been selfish about my partner, and to all the
people I had been involved with.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1476
STRING: I couldn't put all my feelings into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1482
STRING: But I imagined them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148e
STRING: Arie, and Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149a
STRING: Ms. Cordell and Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: And finally, Tortinita beside me now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: How long were we like that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14de
STRING: There was a momentary silence between songs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fe
STRING: I took the chance to open my eyes, and this time Torta
was gazing at my profile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: [Chris] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: [Torta] “We should get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: Saying this, Torta then hurried toward the exit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157c
STRING: There may not have been a special reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: Just like when I was looking at Torta before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: I couldn't run, and besides I didn't feel like hurrying. So I
slowly strolled behind her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: [Torta] “You're slow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: [Chris] “You're the one that rushed ahead, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161e
STRING: I thought of revisiting my previous question, but
stopped myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1634
STRING: Instead I asked about her plans from then on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1640
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, what are we going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1672
STRING: [Torta] “Now... Maybe lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1688
STRING: [Chris] “We left at half past nine, or thereabouts. We
were in line longer than expected, but isn't it still early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c4
STRING: [Torta] “If we were an hour later, the line would be an
hour longer. So it was the right time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e4
STRING: [Chris] “Is that how it is?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: [Torta] “Just look for yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1730
STRING: Torta moved aside and I could see that there were
many more people lined up than when we arrived.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: [Chris] “Everyone is quite religious...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1778
STRING: [Torta] “Just the opposite. They don't come to Mass
except for occasions like these.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1798
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess we're like them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17cc
STRING: [Torta] “That's right. So, what are we doing now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e2
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, should we stop back at your house, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1814
STRING: [Torta] “If we go back now, the Father will probably be
there. We finished praying, and practice doesn't seem
appropriate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183e
STRING: [Chris] “True. But it's too long to just wait until the
concert.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187a
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, that reminds me, did you eat breakfast this
morning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1890
STRING: [Chris] “No, not really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ae
STRING: [Torta] “Were you planning on going like that until
nighttime?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c4
STRING: [Chris] “I hadn't thought about it, but we're not going to
practice, so I should be okay, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1900
STRING: [Torta] “Three meals a day. That's fundamental, right...?
I guess it's two meals for you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1920
STRING: [Chris] “I almost never eat breakfast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1952
STRING: [Torta] “But I can't just let you eat only one meal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1968
STRING: [Chris] “Do you want to go back to my place and eat
something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199a
STRING: [Torta] “Hmmm... I thought of that, but why don't we
look around town?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ba
STRING: [Chris] “Around town. But aren't most of the shops
closed today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d8
STRING: [Torta] “Even so, I'm sure at least one place is open. I'm
not that hungry yet, so we should be fine looking for a
little while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a02
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not that hungry, either, so I guess that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3e
STRING: [Torta] “It's decided then. We'll get cold standing
around, so let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6c
STRING: Looking a little pleased, Torta started walking ahead of
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a78
STRING: She was taking all the initiative; it was totally the
opposite of being with Arie, and I thought this was
easier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aae
STRING: We came to a roofed street, and I was finally able to
brush off the water droplets from my hair and shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac4
STRING: That being said, it was a light rain, so it wasn't much to
worry about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af6
STRING: [Torta] “Does it bother you that much?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0c
STRING: [Chris] “Just a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b22
STRING: Torta seemed to be in high spirits, as she walked
normally without showing the slightest care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b54
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, it looks like that store is open.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6a
STRING: Torta pointed out what looked to be a slightly high-end
ristorante.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b80
STRING: It was a sidewalk cafe-type place, like you would
normally see in the New District, and the customers
were of an older age group.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b96
STRING: Even if today was a special day, a student wouldn't
think to eat there themselves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc8
STRING: [Torta] “Looks expensive, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bde
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe it would be better to go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c10
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm. Let's look around some more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c26
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5e
STRING: As we looked, we arrived at the piazza that was directly
in the middle of the main road that joined the New
District and the Old District.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c74
STRING: I didn't know when it was made, but the sky was
covered with a beautiful canopy that reminded me of a
cathedral and protected pedestrians from the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c94
STRING: Light passed well through the canopy made from finely
blended bronze and glass, and I'd never thought it was
dark, even in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb4
STRING: I felt it especially strongly on days like today, when the
rain was weak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce6
STRING: [Torta] “Ah. What about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cfc
STRING: Saying this as she walked, Torta approached the stall
without waiting for my answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d20
STRING: The only thing written on the simple wooden sign
standing in front of the stall was that they were selling
calzones at an affordable price.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d36
STRING: There was nothing resembling a menu on display, so it
seemed like that was all they sold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4c
STRING: On top of the stand, the name of the portly old man
making calzones inside was written in big letters,
“Marco's Calzones.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, but it may be my first time to try one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9e
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db4
STRING: [Chris] “What, you too Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dca
STRING: A calzone is like a type of pizza, except the toppings are
put inside the bread, so it is good for eating on the
move.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dea
STRING: We'd almost never seen them in the town where we
lived, but one could apparently see this type of stall
regularly in the southern part of the country.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e00
STRING: For someone like me who cooked for themselves and
almost never went outside, I didn't really have an
opportunity to see them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e16
STRING: I thought it wouldn't be strange for Torta to have eaten
one with her friends, though...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e48
STRING: [Torta] “So this is good, then. I'm glad that he came
here on a day like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: [Chris] “Everyone has the day off, so he probably does
better business than you'd think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e7e
STRING: It seemed my assumption was correct, since as we
approached still in conversation, we could see a few
customers buying from the stall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e9e
STRING: It was lunch time, and the people who had finished
praying at the cathedral like us would definitely be a
little hungry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb4
STRING: The rich aroma was enough to make me hungry, even
from far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eca
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f1e
STRING: Just as we got to the front of the stall, we hit a gap in
the customers, so we were able to buy without lining
up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f34
STRING: [Marco] “Sorry to keep you waiting. Are you two
students in Piova?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f54
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, we are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6a
STRING: Maybe because there were no customers behind us, the
portly old man at the stall chatted easily with us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f80
STRING: [Chris] “But how did you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb2
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sure he knew from the uniforms.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd6
STRING: [Marco] “Not even that; kids around your age are
almost all students over there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff6
STRING: [Chris] “Now that you mention it, I guess it's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200c
STRING: There must have been some children from families
working here among them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2022
STRING: But because the only institution for higher education
was the Piova Communal School of Music, almost all of
them would do the opposite of us and move to another
city when they reached the right age.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2042
STRING: You could also say it was because this city was
surrounded by mountains.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: [Marco] “You're wearing your uniforms, so I take it
you're going to the concert?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yes. You know your stuff.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x207a
STRING: [Marco] “Anyone who lives in this town knows that
‘stuff.’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x209a
STRING: [Chris] “That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b0
STRING: The fact that music was the culture of the city was
recognized by the people who lived there, and I had
already met many people who knew more about it than
I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d0
STRING: While oddly admiring this, the smell almost made my
stomach growl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e6
STRING: [Chris] “Um, we have to get going soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20fc
STRING: As I took out my wallet while saying this, the old man
spoke cheerfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2112
STRING: [Marco] “Okay, it'll be half price, just for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2128
STRING: [Chris] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: [Marco] “The fact that you can go to the concert today
is special just by itself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x215e
STRING: [Marco] “If you two say how good my calzones are
when you get famous, that's enough for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217e
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2194
STRING: It seemed there were a lot of things I didn't understand
about southerners' characters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a0
STRING: Most of the students and lecturers came from various
places, so I hadn't really noticed until then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d2
STRING: [Torta] “Umm, I don't know if we'll be famous or not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e8
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha, I'm kidding. That means you practice
a lot, right? Everyone who lives in this city is proud of
you two.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: Perhaps to hide his shyness, the old man laughed loudly
and gave a warm smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223c
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you so much...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2260
STRING: Feeling a little happy, I bowed deeply and took two
calzones in small paper wrappings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2276
STRING: Torta smiled back as she said thank you, and we
walked together to the fountain in the middle of the
piazza.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b2
STRING: We sat down like before, tore open the tops of the
paper wrappings, and took a bite of the still-hot
calzones.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e4
STRING: [Torta] “Mm, this is good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22fa
STRING: [Chris] “It is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2310
STRING: It had been a long time since I'd eaten outside and it
made me feel exuberant, like I was a kid again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2326
STRING: It didn't happen very often, but when I was little, I had
stuffed my cheeks with food from stalls like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x233c
STRING: They didn't look very big, but they were packed with
filling and just eating one made me feel pretty full up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238e
STRING: I watched people leaving the piazza, and to kill time, I
gazed at the canopy and the sky.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a4
STRING: I listened to the rain hitting the glass, and before I knew
it, we had passed almost two hours just sitting there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ba
STRING: [Chris] “That was really good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d0
STRING: It wasn't so difficult to start a conversation with this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2402
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, it was better than I thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2418
STRING: [Chris] “Even so, that was your first one too, wasn't it?
Don't you like that kind of thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2454
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... What kind of image do you have of me...
? Well, that may have been the case before I came
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x247e
STRING: [Chris] “That's exactly the image I have. Like on our way
home from the music school? You'd always be eating
something behind Arie and me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c4
STRING: [Torta] “Why do you only remember stuff like that?
Besides, I always shared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24e4
STRING: [Chris] “It was always your idea to buy it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2516
STRING: [Torta] “Uh... Well, I won't deny that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252c
STRING: [Chris] “Not that you won't, you can't. But from the way
that old man talked, it looks like he's been working here
for a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2572
STRING: [Torta] “I've never seen him at night; maybe he closes in
the evening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. So that doesn't mean you overlooked it,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a6
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I knew about it, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25bc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ee
STRING: [Torta] “I've been busy since I came here. I didn't have
the time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2622
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2638
STRING: Arie and I knew just how hard Torta worked to be able
to come here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264e
STRING: Since we'd come to the school, our classes and where
we lived were different, so we were no longer able to
know things about each other like when we lived next
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266e
STRING: But I sort of understood all the hard work Torta had put
in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2684
STRING: Because of that, she couldn't even buy food like she
liked to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2690
STRING: [Chris] “You've worked really hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ba
STRING: I wasn't trying to praise her or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c6
STRING: I was never praised, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d2
STRING: I was just giving my honest opinion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26de
STRING: But Torta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2706
STRING: [Torta] “Idiot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x271c
STRING: She said this after a short silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2728
STRING: Then she immediately regretted it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2742
STRING: Torta turned her face away, so I couldn't see it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274e
STRING: But I could kind of imagine only why she was here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2764
STRING: Then I understood instinctively that what I thought was
very close to the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x277a
STRING: Torta was here even now, “because I was here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2798
STRING: [Chris] “No, umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ca
STRING: [Torta] “Well, it's about time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e0
STRING: Torta quickly recovered her normal demeanor, and I
could do nothing but play along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah. It might still be a little early, though.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x280c
STRING: I answered after looking at a clock embedded into the
wall of a building in the piazza.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2818
STRING: It was exactly two in the afternoon, so there was thirty
minutes left before the venue opened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2824
STRING: It would take us around ten minutes to walk to the
Concert Hall from the piazza.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283a
STRING: [Chris] “But... It's better than being late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286c
STRING: [Torta] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289a
STRING: We stood up and headed to the Concert Hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a6
STRING: However, we returned to the piazza to throw away the
paper wrappers we were holding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28bc
STRING: We tried to get by with a simple greeting, but the old
man called out to us with a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d2
STRING: [Marco] “Hey you two!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e8
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28fe
STRING: [Marco] “How were my famous calzones?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2914
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, they were delicious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2946
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296a
STRING: There was no need to be polite about that, I just gave
my honest opinion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2980
STRING: [Marco] “I see. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2996
STRING: He said this happily and brought something strange out
from under the stall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ac
STRING: [Chris] “What's that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c2
STRING: [Marco] “It's an accordion. Don't you know that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29d8
STRING: [Chris] “No... I knew that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ee
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha, I'm kidding. There's still time before
the concert, so why don't we sing something? This is
the other thing this shop is famous for.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a18
STRING: Saying this, the old man arranged his fingers on the
keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a24
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, no. We don't have that much time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3a
STRING: [Marco] “Really? There's still enough time, surely?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a50
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I suppose there is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a82
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. Umm, sorry. We're not in much of a hurry,
but... How about next time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab4
STRING: [Torta] “I like your calzones, so I'm sure we'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ad4
STRING: [Marco] “I'm glad you like them. Well, in that case, let's
make it another time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b10
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b26
STRING: [Marco] “Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4a
STRING: Torta was already starting to walk away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b56
STRING: Just as I started to hurry after her, the old man smiled
and whispered to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6c
STRING: [Marco] “If you let her lead you around like this when
you're young, you'll be in trouble later. Just like me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8e
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba4
STRING: The old man's shoulders shook with laughter at his own
clever quip.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bba
STRING: But for a totally different reason, I felt slightly shocked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd0
STRING: I had never thought about how other people would see
us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be6
STRING: But, at least in his eyes, we definitely looked like a
couple.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bfc
STRING: I was sure people would say I was worrying too much
about it, but I felt like I was betraying Arie, and I felt
bad.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c3a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c58
STRING: [Torta] “Chris? Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c82
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c98
STRING: I felt something cold on my face and noticed a single
drop of rain running down my cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cae
STRING: I wiped it with my finger and it was absorbed into my
skin right away, so I couldn't find a trace of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cc4
STRING: [Chris] “It's the rain.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cf6
STRING: [Torta] “You're a dummy... It couldn't be that, you
know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d0c
STRING: Torta pointed at the canopy, and shrugged as if to say it
couldn't be leaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d22
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm? What about the rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d38
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, nothing. It must have been my imagination.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d64
STRING: I looked up and gazed at that beautiful canopy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d70
STRING: Just as Torta said, it didn't seem to be leaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d7c
STRING: [Marco] “Did you feel the rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d92
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da8
STRING: The roof built to avoid the rain was beautiful, and it
didn't seem possible that it was built solely for function.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dbe
STRING: [Chris] “The City of Rain, huh?.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dd4
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm? The City of Rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dea
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No, I was talking to myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e00
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha. It is called that sometimes. Just what
are we talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e3c
STRING: [Torta] “It's the City of Music now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e52
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha. That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e68
STRING: Saying this, the old man played the accordion he was
still holding.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e7e
STRING: Perhaps it was the pride of the people living in this city,
but I could tell how skilled he was just from that sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e94
STRING: And there was no mistaking that I was a resident of this
city, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea0
STRING: I realized that I still had far to go in my playing, and
started talking to the smiling old man playing the
accordion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eb6
STRING: [Chris] “Is that okay while you're working?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ecc
STRING: [Marco] “I play every day. I said this shop was famous
for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ef4
STRING: [Torta] “Well, we really must be going soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f20
STRING: [Marco] “Okay, come again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f38
STRING: We nodded to him and walked away together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f44
STRING: We heard the accordion get louder behind us; it
seemed he really did spend the time between
customers like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f80
STRING: [Torta] “When we got chatting, it was quite fun.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f96
STRING: [Chris] “But isn't it just about time for the venue to
open? There's thirty minutes before it starts, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fbe
STRING: [Torta] “That's true. They won't let us in late, so it's
good we have that much time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe6
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma gave us these tickets, so we can't let
them go to waste.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: When we arrived in front of the hall, there were quite a
few people waiting for the doors to open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304e
STRING: And then almost at the same time as we arrived, the
large doors opened, and the line of people streamed
inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3064
STRING: As for us, we stopped there for a while and waited until
the people thinned out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x307a
STRING: [Chris] “Do you come here often, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ac
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe about as much as you, Chris. Just when I
came to listen for my classes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30cc
STRING: [Chris] “Huh, I thought you came here with Ninna.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ea
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma comes by herself all the time. She's
like a regular; sometimes they even send a car.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310a
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha, I guess you can't keep up with her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312e
STRING: There were classes in the first and second years that
came here to listen to excellent music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3144
STRING: I didn't think anything special at the time, but being
there with normal spectators made me realize again
how important it was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3164
STRING: It was a famous place in this city, and it was rumored to
be the best facility in the country.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x317a
STRING: There must have been many donations by noble families
in the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3190
STRING: You couldn't really say that the decoration of the
building itself was very luxurious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a6
STRING: But, that meant the simply designed building lost none
of its majesty, and it was filled with a certain kind of
dignity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31bc
STRING: You could say it was a fitting place to receive visitors
not only from this country, but also from other
countries.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31d2
STRING: I was overwhelmed by the atmosphere there for a
moment and felt out of place, but when I saw other
students in uniform in the distance, I was a little
relieved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31f2
STRING: [Chris] “It looks like there's some other students from
the school here, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3224
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. But it seems like lots more higher-ups
than students have been invited, unlike other concerts.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3244
STRING: [Chris] “Higher-ups?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3276
STRING: [Torta] “Well... The tickets aren't sold normally. So all
the students here either know the performers, or are
connected in some way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a0
STRING: I suppose it could be called a distinctive feature of the
city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ac
STRING: The students of Piova, with just their student
identification, could get into many concerts for free, or
for half price.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32cc
STRING: Apparently there were grants from the city's coffers, but
unfortunately I hadn't yet utilized them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e2
STRING: [Chris] “That means... Us too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3314
STRING: [Torta] “It seems Grandma is pretty famous in this city.
How many people do you think moved to this city on a
whim?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3346
STRING: [Torta] “And it seems she goes to almost all the notable
concerts.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3366
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't know that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3398
STRING: [Torta] “Yep, let's go inside. It looks like the entrance is
clear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33dc
STRING: Even though not much time had passed since the doors
opened, the hall was already almost full.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33f2
STRING: The tickets must have been distributed randomly, as
there were no other students in the seats around us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3408
STRING: It was all gentlemen in fine suits and ladies in dresses.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x341e
STRING: I felt it before we went inside, but we really stood out
amongst them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3450
STRING: [Torta] “Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3466
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'm just a little nervous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3498
STRING: [Torta] “You probably feel out of place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34ae
STRING: [Chris] “Does that mean you do, too, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e0
STRING: [Torta] “I don't really feel that way, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350a
STRING: Saying this, Torta puffed out her chest and pointed to a
spot on it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3520
STRING: She pointed to the simply designed Piova Communal
School of Music badge sewn to the chest of her
uniform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3536
STRING: Before I could understand what Torta was trying to say,
reality intervened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3554
STRING: [Gentleman] “Excuse me. May I pass in front?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356a
STRING: The gentleman's seat was further down the row, so he
asked us to let him go past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x358a
STRING: [Torta] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a8
STRING: [Gentleman] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35be
STRING: We both pulled back a bit, and the gentleman smiled,
bowed his head again, and moved down the row.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35d6
STRING: There was nothing in his behavior or voice to indicate
he was speaking to students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35ec
STRING: He treated us like we were people that belonged there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3602
STRING: Just like the old man selling calzones said, it seemed we
were the pride of this city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3618
STRING: Maybe I just should have been proud of that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3624
STRING: But I wasn't as serious a student as Torta, so I just
decided to think that I was out of place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3656
STRING: [Torta] “See?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366c
STRING: Torta whispered this with a smile, and turned her gaze
forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368c
STRING: At the same time, the buzzer signaling the start rang
out, and the hall instantly became silent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a2
STRING: I quickly looked at the pamphlet they gave me at the
entrance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36ae
STRING: The start of the program was perfect for Natale: an a
capella choir.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36c4
STRING: It was easy to see that Torta, as a voice student, was
the most interested in this just by glancing over at her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36da
STRING: Her eyes were shining, and she was listening intently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e6
STRING: I stopped myself from saying anything, and faced
forward, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36fc
STRING: Just as I was doing this, the choir lined up on the stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3712
STRING: Then, a hymn in praise of God suddenly began.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3738
STRING: The solemn voices reverberated throughout the hall,
which had been built to the highest standards of
acoustic engineering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374e
STRING: The music was much more artistic than what we had
heard in the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3764
STRING: I could feel the vibrations viscerally.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3770
STRING: It was easy to feel God's presence there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x377e
STRING: When I looked at Torta between the stanzas of the
song, she was staring at the stage with tears in her
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3794
STRING: Even I could only take my eyes away when they weren't
singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37aa
STRING: What did this song mean for Torta, who was a singing
major, and may sing for a living one day?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37d4
STRING: At some point I found myself just staring at Torta's
profile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3822
STRING: In the end, over the entire three hours of the concert
and intermission, we really only spoke two or three
words to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3842
STRING: Torta hardly moved at all during the fifteen-minute
intermission; it seemed like she was trying to lock all
the music she just heard into her mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3862
STRING: I thought I had been listening seriously, too, but the
time I was distracted by Torta next to me may have
been longer than I realized.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3882
STRING: It wasn't something as simple as admiration.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x388e
STRING: I was perplexed at being in such a place at this time
with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a4
STRING: What was Torta to me...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38b0
STRING: In the afternoon, the old man talked to us like a couple.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38bc
STRING: We were in a situation where that wouldn't be a
strange conclusion to draw.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c8
STRING: But in truth we were just childhood friends, and friends
that attended the same school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38de
STRING: But... It wasn't just that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38ea
STRING: I didn't think our relationship was so shallow as to be
summed up like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3900
STRING: I didn't want to put it into words; I just pondered it, and
pretended not to know the answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3946
STRING: When we went outside, the area was completely dark.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3952
STRING: I stretched my body, stiff from sitting for a long time,
and took a deep breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3968
STRING: [Chris] “Phew... That was long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x399a
STRING: [Torta] “Really? I kind of felt like it was over in no time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39b0
STRING: Torta answered sort of vacantly, as if still excited.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39c6
STRING: I felt like there was cotton stuffed in my ears and tried
shaking my head a few times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39f8
STRING: [Torta] “But it really was good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah it was. But I wonder if this is the last time
we'll come here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4a
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm, I wonder. If we're successful, next time
we might be up on stage.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a6a
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. That would be nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a9c
STRING: [Torta] “You're talking like it's someone else's problem.
Don't you want to be a professional?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ab2
STRING: [Chris] “Honestly, I don't know... I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae4
STRING: [Torta] “But I thought you were naturally aiming for that,
coming to this school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b04
STRING: [Chris] “That's... Let's talk about it while we walk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b28
STRING: I was sure I wouldn't think of anything to say in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b34
STRING: I continued while heading for the roofed-in section of
the main road.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b58
STRING: [Chris] “I thought that at first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b8a
STRING: [Torta] “Becoming a professional?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ba0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. But since I've been at school, my thinking
has changed a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bdc
STRING: [Torta] “So what are you going to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bf2
STRING: [Chris] “It's kind of embarrassing... But I haven't thought
of anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c24
STRING: [Torta] “That's ridiculous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c3a
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But I can't imagine it. Me becoming a
pro and performing on a stage like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c76
STRING: [Torta] “That's why I'm asking what you're going to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c8c
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know that, either. I'm just concerned with
the graduation recital now... Can you just give me that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cb4
STRING: [Torta] “You'll finally think about it when that's over?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cca
STRING: [Chris] “That's my plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cfc
STRING: [Torta] “Well... Alright, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d26
STRING: Sounding exasperated as she said this , Torta laughed
lightly again, forgiving me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d3c
STRING: [Chris] “Are you going to move right into being a
professional, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6e
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm... It's a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d84
STRING: [Chris] “What's that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da2
STRING: [Torta] “I'll tell you when you decide and tell me about
it, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dc2
STRING: [Chris] “That's mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3df4
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mean to be. I was trying to get you to
think about it even a little, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e14
STRING: [Chris] “Am I that unreliable?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e46
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, you're that unreliable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e5c
STRING: [Chris] “Wow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8e
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha. Well, if you still haven't decided when
the time comes, I'll think with you. I'll help you however I
can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eb8
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Umm... Yeah, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eea
STRING: [Torta] “However... However I can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f00
STRING: Torta repeated her final words as if she hadn't heard my
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f16
STRING: Was it good for me to let Torta spoil me like that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2c
STRING: If the path I chose wasn't the one that Torta was hoping
for, would I hurt her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f82
STRING: [Torta] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f98
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fae
STRING: As soon as I entered the room, I could smell delicious
food.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fba
STRING: Ninna seemed to be in the kitchen at the moment, and
it seemed she had gone all out, so today would be
another feast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ff6
STRING: [Torta] “You're having dinner before you go, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x400c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's my plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x403e
STRING: [Torta] “Today we'll have meat. Today's meal will be as
splendid as yesterday's... Makes me worry about my
weight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x405e
STRING: [Chris] “It's Natale, it can't be helped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4074
STRING: As for myself, I had always spent the time with Arie
since coming here, so I never ate that much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x408a
STRING: But when I lived at home, every evening of Natale
meant a mountain of food. It made me feel like I ate
enough for the entire year in one day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40d0
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I'll go help a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40ea
STRING: Before that, Torta ran upstairs like she remembered
something, and came down after changing into her
everyday clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4100
STRING: Then she went straight into the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x410c
STRING: Ninna must not have realized we were back, or maybe
she was focusing on cooking, as there were no signs of
her coming out of the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x412c
STRING: I knew she'd refuse if I offered to help, so I sat in a chair
to wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4142
STRING: It would have been a good time to talk to Phorni, but I
couldn't see her on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4158
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4178
STRING: I called out to her in a whisper, but she showed no
signs of appearing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: Right at that moment, just as I strained my ears, I heard
Phorni's singing voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x419a
STRING: It came from the kitchen, where Ninna and Torta were
as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41a6
STRING: [Chris] “What's she doing...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41bc
STRING: They shouldn't be able to hear her, so she must be
singing completely out of boredom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41d2
STRING: If I went to the kitchen now, it would definitely seem
strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e8
STRING: There was still time, and Phorni had the good sense to
come back to me before I left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41fe
STRING: Just as I was passing the time like this, Torta came out
of the kitchen, carefully carrying a plate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4238
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, be careful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4256
STRING: At the same time Torta set down the big, heavy-looking
plate, Phorni flapped her wings and descended from her
shoulder to the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42a6
STRING: [Torta] “Whoa.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42bc
STRING: [Chris] “Is something wrong...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42ee
STRING: [Torta] “No, maybe there was a bug... My neck tickled
all of a sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4322
STRING: [Chris] “A bug...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4354
STRING: [Phorni] “Aaah, that's meeaaann!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436a
STRING: [Chris] “I couldn't see anything. Maybe it was your hair
or something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x438a
STRING: Holding in my laughter, I answered incredulously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43b2
STRING: [Torta] “Well... Must've been my imagination. Okay,
there's a lot more so I'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43d2
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43f6
STRING: Torta returned to the kitchen with a slightly strange
look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4428
STRING: [Phorni] “Calling me a bug is mean... Torta's a jerk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x443e
STRING: [Chris] “Then... Try harder to not get caught.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4470
STRING: [Phorni] “But walking would have been such a pain. You
should have come to get me, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4490
STRING: [Chris] “So you're saying I should have gone to the
kitchen. You know they'd throw me right out, right?
How did you get in there anyway?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44d6
STRING: [Phorni] “I walked, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44ec
STRING: [Chris] “So you could've walked back...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x451e
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, she's back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4538
STRING: At Phorni's warning, I quickly shut my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4544
STRING: Even so, Phorni didn't seem to be in that bad of a mood,
even though I had left her alone all day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x455a
STRING: Singing for no one like that must have meant just being
next to Ninna made her happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4570
STRING: I decided to stop any further aimless conversation, and
waited in my chair for the food to come out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45a0
STRING: The dinner table was even fuller than the day before
with things like chicken roasted with herbs, and the
lasagna I'd had before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c0
STRING: Then I realized how comfortable I was with this irregular
Natale scene.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45d6
STRING: I felt at ease and was disgusted with myself for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45e2
STRING: Maybe I would have to repeat this over and over until
the graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4600
STRING: Dinner time passed peacefully nonetheless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4660
STRING: [Torta] “Well, we practice every day starting tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4676
STRING: Torta smiled, spoiling the fun as I was leaving.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468c
STRING: I was full with delicious food, and just as I was leaving
to go home in a good mood... She does that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46a2
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46b8
STRING: I answered with my hand on the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c4
STRING: The day was decided, now the only problem was the
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46ec
STRING: [Torta] “From ten o' clock is okay, right? Same as when
school would start.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4702
STRING: It felt more like she was reminding me of the time she
decided on rather than asking me a question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4718
STRING: Certainly, it was the same time as my private lessons as
a third-year student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472e
STRING: Still, thirty minutes seemed fast for Torta to get ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4744
STRING: And during our winter break, when we should be able
to use our time freely, we'd be practicing from the
morning...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4776
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, let's make it at your apartment, Chris, not
the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4796
STRING: And this one was being selfish, too...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47be
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... You won't say no to that, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47f0
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm saying tell Torta that quick.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4806
STRING: Phorni said this petulantly, pulling on my ear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x481c
STRING: If we didn't go to the school, I wouldn't have to wear
my uniform, and I could sleep longer... I suppose that
would be okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... Is my apartment okay instead of the
school?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4874
STRING: [Torta] “You want to sleep as long as possible... That's
fine. Why don't you come here sometimes? Right,
Grandma?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48be
STRING: [Ninna] “Hmm? Oh, right. I'll feed you dinner at least.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48de
STRING: [Chris] “No, I don't want to put you out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4910
STRING: [Ninna] “Don't you worry about that. Or don't you want
to come here, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494c
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, how could you be so mean...?.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498c
STRING: [Phorni] “Right. You could come here half the time,
right? You'll bring me with you, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49ac
STRING: With three women complaining to me, I couldn't refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49c2
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... Okay, I would be glad to come.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a02
STRING: [Ninna] “Good. Children should eat as much as they
want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a22
STRING: Ninna... That wasn't what I meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a4a
STRING: [Torta] “It's decided then. I don't like putting on my
uniform either, so it's perfect.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a94
STRING: [Phorni] “Yaaay. Now I won't be bored.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ac6
STRING: [Torta] “For now... Your place at ten, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae6
STRING: [Chris] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b28
STRING: Phorni had thought she'd be bored during our practices,
but even after we got outside, she seemed happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b5a
STRING: [Phorni] “It's gonna be rough from tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b70
STRING: [Chris] “Like it's anything to do with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b8e
STRING: [Phorni] “I thought I'd be even more bored this year, so
I'm just really happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bae
STRING: [Chris] “But that's how it is when I'm at school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be0
STRING: [Phorni] “Vacation is vacation. Also, it's better than just
sleeping like you always do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c00
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I admit that much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c16
STRING: Even though winter vacation was starting tomorrow, it
would be the same as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c2c
STRING: The school shouldn't be open on New Year's or the day
after, so maybe it would be better to practice properly
at the school?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c54
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey-hey, let's go home while you're thinking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. I'm used to being employed as your
legs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c9c
STRING: [Phorni] “That again. I should be able to go out
sometimes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cbc
STRING: [Chris] “Sometimes? I brought you out just yesterday!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cda
STRING: [Phorni] “But it's only a couple times a year.  I've only
been to Torta's house three times in three years!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cfa
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d24
STRING: I looked at Phorni still in good spirits, and started to feel
uneasy that I may have been making her feel lonely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d44
STRING: If it made her that happy, I probably should have
brought her out more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d5a
STRING: She didn't say she wanted to go out herself very much,
but maybe she was being polite in her own way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d70
STRING: She was being selfish like that, but I didn't really mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d86
STRING: Though, in the end I couldn't say that Phorni hadn't
been selfish up to that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dd6
STRING: We arrived home, and my hand stopped as it reached
for the towel in the entryway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dec
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e1e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e34
STRING: [Chris] “The towel. I have to get it myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e66
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, I always do that. You could at least do it
yourself at times like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e86
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But I was just thinking it really is always
there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ec2
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't know what you'll do when I'm not
around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ee2
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ef8
STRING: I thought about that for a moment, and was at a loss for
words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f20
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh... Why are you worrying about it? It's okay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f36
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4c
STRING: When I moved out of this apartment, I wouldn't come
back to visit Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f62
STRING: I had my daily work... Recently in particular I was busy
practicing for the graduation recital, so I hadn't had
much time to think about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f78
STRING: It was definitely something important that I couldn't
forget.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f84
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fac
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey there! I said don't think about it. I told you
it was okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fcc
STRING: [Chris] “What's okay...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ffe
STRING: [Phorni] “You don't have to think about it, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5022
STRING: Phorni said this, and glided into the center of the room
to end our conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5038
STRING: Then she stood where the towels were, and beckoned
me with a wave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5056
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, you'll catch a cold being all wet like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506c
STRING: [Chris] “I know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5082
STRING: To avoid any further talk on the topic, I wiped my hair
with the towel like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5098
STRING: I opened the letter I grabbed from the mail box on my
way in, and sat in a chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50b6
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey! Put me up high.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50cc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Oh, is the window okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50ea
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm. On the table if possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5100
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x511e
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't worry about the details. Come on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5134
STRING: We'd both be in trouble when the other was gone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514a
STRING: In a different way than with Arie and Torta, Phorni and I
needed each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5160
STRING: It may have been up to Phorni how long the relationship
would last.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5176
STRING: If Phorni didn't say anything... I was sure I'd ask her,
“Coming with me?” in the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x518c
STRING: Phorni was the one who would choose which way
things would go after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Is smiling while you ignore me a new kind of
teasing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51b6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51cc
STRING: I quickly picked Phorni up and put her on the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51ec
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... But don't look at the letter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x520a
STRING: [Phorni] “I know. I'll just watch you read the letter, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x522a
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm... I don't like that, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x525c
STRING: [Phorni] “Be reasonable. I always watch you anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5272
STRING: [Chris] “Listen to what you're saying... ＊sigh＊ Fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52ae
STRING: [Phorni] “That's it. Acceptance is key.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52c4
STRING: Phorni spread her wings on the table, appearing to
enjoy herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52da
STRING: I convinced myself that she always watched me anyway,
and opened the letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5330
STRING: How are you, Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5344
STRING: And how is the rain?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x535a
STRING: The weather here is nice as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536e
STRING: Even if it is very far away, it's strange that it's always
raining there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538c
STRING: Today is Natale; did you go to offer prayers at church
like you should?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53aa
STRING: I was with you last year, but was a little worried since I
couldn't go this year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53c8
STRING: You sort of said that Torta might be your partner in your
last letter, but if she is, you probably went with her,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53f0
STRING: I'd worry if it was just you, Chris, but I'm relieved that
Torta is there, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540e
STRING: This will be the last letter of the year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5422
STRING: In any case, next year's letter will be there very soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5440
STRING: Maybe you'll have decided on Torta as your partner by
then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5460
STRING: If it's you and Torta, Chris, I'm sure it'll be fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5474
STRING: I'm saying that having heard both of you play for a long
time, so I'm absolutely certain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5494
STRING: You may write something mean since it's about you, so
let me write this first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54b2
STRING: I've gotten better at singing, and I know good music
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54d0
STRING: So go into the recital with confidence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e4
STRING: I can't go to hear you, but I can always imagine your
sound, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5502
STRING: The sound of your Fortelle, Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5516
STRING: And the sound of you two together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5534
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556a
STRING: She could always imagine me... Huh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5576
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x558c
STRING: Could I imagine Arie at any time?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5598
STRING: I hadn't forgotten her, had I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55ac
STRING: While I was spending time with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55b8
STRING: While we were enjoying our ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e8
STRING: [Phorni] “Why the serious face...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55fe
STRING: [Chris] “S-Serious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5630
STRING: [Phorni] “Did she write something that's bothering you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5646
STRING: [Chris] “Something that's bothering me... I don't know if
I could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x565c
STRING: It was a single, innocuous sentence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5668
STRING: [Chris] “She said she could imagine me any time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x569a
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow, that's embarrassing... I don't see a
reason to make that face, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56ba
STRING: [Chris] “I was just wondering if I could imagine Arie any
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't you think about her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570c
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I do, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x573e
STRING: [Phorni] “You think about Torta...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5754
STRING: [Chris] “That, too. And maybe when I play the Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5790
STRING: [Phorni] “Torta and the Fortelle are the same problem in
the end, right? She's your partner, so you have to think
about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57ba
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57ec
STRING: [Phorni] “Also! She said any time, but it isn't really all the
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5814
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm sure Arie is focused when she's baking
bread, and not thinking of anything else, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5834
STRING: [Chris] “Well... I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5866
STRING: [Phorni] “That's what I mean... I guess in the end we're
just talking about your love life.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5886
STRING: [Chris] “No we're not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58b8
STRING: [Phorni] “I wonder.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58ce
STRING: Phorni snickered, and taunted me about Arie again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58e4
STRING: But I still couldn't think of it that optimistically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58f0
STRING: What about when I thought of Torta when nothing was
happening?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58fc
STRING: What about the fact that I enjoyed spending time with
Torta at times that had nothing to do with music?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hurry up and write your reply. Torta said you
have to practice every morning starting tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x594e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5964
STRING: Either she didn't understand anything, or she said it
even though she understood; either way Phorni
carelessly put a stop to my thoughts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x597a
STRING: Maybe it was best for me to put some more distance
between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5986
STRING: Just like I had up to that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5992
STRING: [Chris] “For now, let's do our ensemble when I'm
finished with this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59ce
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, is that okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e4
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't touched my instrument at all today.
Aren't you tired, though?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a20
STRING: [Phorni] “Who do you think I am? I'm always ready to
sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a40
STRING: [Chris] “When I'm finished writing my reply.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a72
STRING: [Phorni] “Then hurry up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a88
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5aac
STRING: I felt like I was finally my normal self again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ab8
STRING: Even so, I knew that would change when tomorrow
came.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ace
STRING: I had to distance myself from Torta again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ada
STRING: I didn't want to hurt her if I could help it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ae6
STRING: I didn't want anything to change if I could help it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5af2
STRING: Going over all these selfish things in my head... I
thought in the end it would be best to just enjoy this
time.
